#developer #python #django #reactjs #remote #part_time #parttime #lead #greatbritain #job #jobs #python #backend #–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #remotework #ml #urgently
Vacancy: Lead Python developer
Country: Great Britain
Employment: Full-time remote/ Part-Time (20 h a week)
Salary:  2500$+ - net
Our client, a unique mass media project (platform) is looking for a Lead Developer/CTO to further develop the product and team while creating a culture of positivity & problem solving with a sense of fun.
Income level depends on your previous experience & knowledge.
It‚Äôs an exciting and pivotal time for the product and business - we have a solid platform and foundation of clients asking for features that no one in the market yet offers.
So, as well as servicing the current offering, there is a greenfield opportunity to further develop the platform using smart tech.
‚úÖ Responsibilities:
- Co-creating and delivering the strategy.
- Managing and building the team, as well as being hands on with the code.
There are many technical challenges, core of which are based around using machine learning to surface how clients can make content more readable and enticing, as well as where and when to deliver it to maximise results.
‚úÖ The current tech stack is based on: Python, Django, ReactJS, Elasticsearch, .NET Core, AngularJS, Docker + AWS Infrastructure.
We expect you to take the lead on how to evolve the stack in a smart way.
üé¨ Requirements:
You‚Äôve been around the block and are now hungry to become more commercial, take ownership, and although you don‚Äôt want to stop coding, you‚Äôre keen to manage and build teams or develop existing skills in these areas.
A strong interest in data science and machine learning.
You‚Äôve been a lead developer or CTO before.
You‚Äôve built and scaled a SaaS platform.
Would be great if you have a background in news publishing or analytics.
You‚Äôve managed teams or are now ready to do so.
Contact: @OlgaVzh
